mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_password, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_register_date) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPhone}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select member_id, member_password, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_point from member where member_id=#{memberId} and member_password=#{memberPassword}
select count(*) from member where member_id=#{value}
select member_id, member_password, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_point, member_level from member where member_id=#{value}
mapper.update: update member set member_email=#{memberEmail}, member_phone=#{memberPhone} where member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select card_no, card_type, to_char(card_expiration_date, 'YYYY/MM') as card_expiration_date, member_id, to_char(card_birth, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as card_birth from card where card_no=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into card(card_no, member_id, card_type, card_expiration_date, card_password, card_birth) values(#{cardVO.cardNo}, #{memberId}, #{cardVO.cardType}, to_date(#{cardVO.cardExpirationDate},'YYYY/MM'), #{cardVO.cardPassword}, to_date(#{cardVO.cardBirth},'YYYY/MM/DD'))
mapper.update: update card set card_expiration_date=to_date(#{cardVO.cardExpirationDate},'YYYY/MM'), card_password=#{cardVO.cardPassword} where member_id=#{memberId} and card_no=#{cardVO.cardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into driving_license(license_no, member_id, license_type, license_renewal_term, license_issue_date, gender, license_birth) values(#{drivingLicenseVO.licenseNo}, #{memberId}, #{drivingLicenseVO.licenseType}, to_date(#{drivingLicenseVO.licenseRenewalTerm},'YYYY/MM/DD'), to_date(#{drivingLicenseVO.licenseIssueDate},'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{drivingLicenseVO.gender}, to_date(#{drivingLicenseVO.licenseBirth},'YYYY/MM/DD'))
mapper.select: select license_no, member_id, license_type, to_char(license_renewal_term, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as license_renewal_term, to_char(license_issue_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as license_issue_date, gender, to_char(license_birth, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as license_birth from driving_license where license_no=#{drivingLicenseVO.licenseNo}
mapper.update: update driving_license set license_renewal_term=to_date(#{drivingLicenseVO.licenseRenewalTerm},'YYYY/MM/DD'), license_issue_date=to_date(#{drivingLicenseVO.licenseIssueDate},'YYYY/MM/DD') where member_id=#{memberId} and license_no=#{drivingLicenseVO.licenseNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_id=#{memberId} and member_password=#{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update member set member_password=#{memberPassword} where member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select license_location_name from license_location order by license_location_no

select member_id, license_no, license_type, to_char(license_renewal_term, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as license_renewal_term, to_char(license_issue_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as license_issue_date, gender, to_char(license_birth, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as license_birth from driving_license where member_id=#{value}
select member_id, card_no, card_type, to_char(card_expiration_date, 'YYYY/MM') as card_expiration_date, member_id, to_char(card_birth, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as card_birth from card where member_id=#{value}
select count(card_no) from card where member_id=#{value}
select member_point from member where member_id=#{value}
